keywords: Cupcake,Pescatarian,Strawberry,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Strawberry Fairy Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 180 degrees. Line a 12 hole cupcake tin with patty pan cases. Gather ingredients. Sift the flour into a large mixing bowl. Add the soft butter, sugar, vanilla essence and eggs and beat with an electric beater on a low speed for 2 minutes, or until combined.
Spoon the mixture evenly into the cupcake cases and bake for 15 - 20 minutes or until golden and firm to touch.
While they are cooling, make the strawberry cream mixture. Mash the strawberries in a bowl with a fork, add the mascarpone and sifted icing sugar to bowl.
Beat with a wooden spoon until combined. Chill the mixture for 30 minutes.

To serve, slice the top of each cake, then cut each one in half ( to make wings ) Spoon a tablespoon of strawberry cream mixture onto top of each cake and press in wings. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
